website_summaries.verdict: Be prepared, scouts — the Northstar lantern is bright enough to illuminate your entire campsite.
pros: Use this lantern when you need a lot of bright light rather than longer-term, low light
Folding base gives stability when lantern is lit, low-profile storage when it's not
cons: A light this bright uses a lot of propane, so be sure you pack extra

customer_reviews.title: Bright!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp. Half power on this lamp out shines it's little brother. Full power will light up camp like flourescent lighting. Eats a little more propane at the higher settings (which I never ran it on... half is enough). Perfect for running on a stem on a 20lb propane bottle. Nice to know you have that extra range of power if you need it though.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get your hopes up too high
customer_reviews.text: The construction isn’t what Coleman was known for. I’ve had a problem with the long single mantle design in that they aren’t long enough when burnt down. The mantle shrinks down and tears itself at the ends. I have an older model with less distance between the mantle fasteners and it works fine. The mantles are going to be costly as I don’t think they’ll tolerate much movement without breaking
customer_reviews.author: NJMama

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS! DANGER!!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZON sent a second unit with the same lantern piezo that is out of position after about 5 ignition uses. The propane will build up while you push the button.. AND repeat over and over! The design is a major DEFECT. EXPLOSION HAZARD!
customer_reviews.author: Mikerbr

customer_reviews.title: Always be careful of the globe. They can break. So, buy the carrying case!
customer_reviews.text: I like the overall quality and the 1500 lumins of light. For extended use(many hours) I recommend buying a larger propane tank and required hose(5' or longer). A three gallon tank (which is a smaller one) will weigh about 10-15 pounds full and will last for many hours, even if you simultaneously run a propane camp stove with it--this latter use requires a distributor (also called a tree) and another hose. All pretty simple to use. Read all the safety regulations that come with this gear, especially as regards use in an enclosed environment!
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not Coleman’s best effort. Other reviews gave the impression of “wow” brightness but I wasn’t so impressed. The glass and wire fit to the base is mediocre. The gas valve attachment to the propane bottle leaves the lamp slightly cocked to the side. The base is too big to securely attach to the standard green Coleman propane bottles that they have a blue million of at Walmart, Academy Sports, etc. I think you can get a cheaper Coleman lantern that does just as well, or maybe another brand or LED model.
customer_reviews.author: WLM

customer_reviews.title: Dose not include case.
customer_reviews.text: This product is nice. It is fragile though. Don’t drop. Lights up great. My problem was with the description and pictures. The seller deceives by placing a picture with case and dose not show anywhere that case is not included. This bothered me and thought I should share.
customer_reviews.author: josue

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Coleman lantern, you can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.text: I hooked this miniature sun up to a large propane tank on our last camping trip. It did not disappoint me. Not only did it provide ample light, it also attracted plenty of moths & mayflies for fishing bait. It is fully adjustable down to a warm glow, but where’s the fun in that?
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Durr

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, poor mantle performance
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a new style lantern from the proven Coleman line. Started fast and burned bright. But immediately saw the mantle tearing at the bottom. Don't like how it tore up as soon as it lit. Better have a lot of mantles with you
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: The best propane light out there
customer_reviews.text: This outdoor light is perfect. It is so easy to use and is one of the brightest out there. I use a larger propane tank (and one of those propane trees), because on the brightest, this will go through the small cylinders quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Apollinaire

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I use it for camping or when the power goes out. Works great but be sure to buy extra mantel's cause they are fragile
customer_reviews.author: Chad baker

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Our old lantern broke. This new one is exactly like the one we had, great product. Hope it last as long as the last one. 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: Karen McCaslin

customer_reviews.title: Super Bright
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is great. It's super bright, especially compared to older propane lanterns I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and durable camp light
customer_reviews.text: Awesome light for Summer and winter camping trips. Highly recommend over the standard Coleman propane lanterns.
customer_reviews.author: Frank C.

customer_reviews.title: Mistake or deception ??
customer_reviews.text: Pictured Coleman showed lantern and case but only received lantern. Mistake or deception ?
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Cabe

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp super bright
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp, the mantles are very fragile so buy extra
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Best Coleman lantern
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as backup because the price was too goo to pass up on.
customer_reviews.author: Nhia Vang

customer_reviews.title: We use the lantern quite a lot and it is ...
customer_reviews.text: We use the lantern quite a lot and it is bright, and it lights up every time and it does not leak as far as I can tell. The base is not very snug on the gas bottle, sometimes when I pick the lantern up, the base stays where it was, which I think is not a big deal at all.
customer_reviews.author: P. Karpenko

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy Again.
customer_reviews.text: Great Latern, excellent illumination, will buy again as I need more.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Fox

customer_reviews.title: I saw someone with these the year before,  now I have two also
customer_reviews.text: Had these for a while in the garage, finally went camping. Two of these at a camp site are great. Push button start and brighter than other camp sites next to us.
customer_reviews.author: jaycee

customer_reviews.title: Light for camping
customer_reviews.text: This is not for making a room or place being warm, but for being bright. So, with this functionality, it satisfies what it is expected.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Mantle is a bit touchy to replace. But a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: low light,
customer_reviews.text: very poor light.the other reviews are wrong.mmy old lanterns are a lot better
customer_reviews.author: ruben dewitt

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright !!!
customer_reviews.text: So bright that without the reflector it would dazzle othe campers. Great for lighting a group campsite
customer_reviews.author: Les Brown

customer_reviews.title: Nice purchase
customer_reviews.text: I think it's a well made product that puts out a lot of light and it should last for many years to come. A case is a must because of the glass globe.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fitzsimmons

customer_reviews.title: Super Bright
customer_reviews.text: Brightest propane light I have ever owned.. I have used many others.. Very durable too...
customer_reviews.author: Meranda Focht

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This classic lantern works well and is a fantastic value.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELINE STANDBRIDGE

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Bright
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this lantern. He now has 3 of the on our pier. They are bright and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnn Holleman

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, not easily started.
customer_reviews.text: I like this Lantern. I wouldn't call it instastart by any means. Over all good sturdy product. Wish the piezoelectric clicker had a little stronger spark.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Eanes

customer_reviews.title: Is perfect for my, I loved
customer_reviews.text: Is super handy and bright perfect, the dial is great because you control the light you want for you table, the only issues was the mantle clip was Brock when I turned first time, but work okay.
customer_reviews.author: Jose C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome light!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excelent lantern , awesome light , I’m very happy with this buy
customer_reviews.author: E. Gabriel Suarez Resendez

customer_reviews.title: propane lantern
customer_reviews.text: just like the one i already had except , this time i got the clear glass,, more / brighter light when used inside...
customer_reviews.author: del greening

customer_reviews.title: Very bright and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I think this lantern is perfect when needing brighten a large area. It is easy to use and great.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: This is not your dad's lantern, it is much stronger souce of light!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, who wouldn't love the amount of light this lantern puts out!
customer_reviews.author: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don't know how I got along without this lantern. Really throws out the light.
customer_reviews.author: RON

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great lantern. Bought for grandson to use for cub scouts.
customer_reviews.author: mawmaw2enl

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I now have two of them
customer_reviews.text: Fast deliver. Great product. I now have two of them.
customer_reviews.author: donald r. headley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tracking deer
customer_reviews.text: Go Bright!!!! Perfect for tracking deer, there is no substitute for lantern light.
customer_reviews.author: Hunting in the Dark

customer_reviews.title: Use caution when inserting bottle
customer_reviews.text: This thing is totally awesome... Super efficient.... Super bright.... The only drawback is that you really need to be careful not to cross-thread the base when installing the bottle. Reason being is that the threads in the base are in a softer metal material that is easily damaged by the steel bottle threads that's being inserted.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Lots of light, but also noisy
customer_reviews.text: Very noisy if you turn it onto the brighter settings, but puts out a lot of light, I would say at max settings, easily comparable to a 150W light bulb. The regulator is somewhat flimsy and does not allow full control over the gas flow (pretty much 6 settings) and the stand is pretty much useless, otherwise an O.K. lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality lantern.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, is very easy to light. Took off a star because it doesn't have a carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: and price was great. The Coleman lantern came partially assembled and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered through Amazon and shipping, and price was great. The Coleman lantern came partially assembled and it was no problem to finish putting together. Very bright lantern. A bit noisy but okay with me as this will be outside mostly. Also easy putting on the single mantle.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Fus

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: Regulator was broken out of the box and was very loud on low light setting and would flutter light on high light setting. It wasn't as bright as I thought it would be, but then again it's broken. Not sure if this is normal, but the top got VERY hot.
customer_reviews.author: TheHut

customer_reviews.title: excellent light really amazed at how bright it is
customer_reviews.text: excellent light really amazed at how bright it is. wish i had a hard case
customer_reviews.author: josh bigham

customer_reviews.title: The Coleman 2 mantle lanterns aren't as bright and with the exposed glass have a tendency to break easily. I've had no issues wi
customer_reviews.text: I've used lots of lanterns over the years camping and this seems to be the brightest. The Coleman 2 mantle lanterns aren't as bright and with the exposed glass have a tendency to break easily. I've had no issues with glass breaking on this so far even after a couple of topples.
customer_reviews.author: James D

customer_reviews.title: Very bright lantern
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful lantern. This lantern is by far the brightest one I have ever used, which of course also means, lots of propane. I recommend buying a propane tank adapter to hook it up to a 20lb propane tank, which Coleman sells as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: husband was excited to get this in. Just what he wanted
customer_reviews.author: rjsgirl

customer_reviews.title: Super bright, lights right up
customer_reviews.text: Super bright, lights right up! Mantle is more expensive and harder to find. I just keep 5 mantles around. I also keep it in the plastic Coleman lantern case. I recommend it! Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: works good. doesn't seem as bright as the lanterns that ...
customer_reviews.text: works good. doesn't seem as bright as the lanterns that use coleman fuel but i knew that when i bought it. only complaint is it I have to press the ignition button quite a few times before it will light.
customer_reviews.author: J.K

customer_reviews.title: Best Lantern
customer_reviews.text: Best lantern on the market. Worth the extra money to get the Northstar. Will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Scouter

customer_reviews.title: This self lighting propane model is so much easier to ...
customer_reviews.text: This self lighting propane model is so much easier to use that the old gas models. No more pumping....just connect a propane bottle, hit the ignitor and you've got bright light!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Miller

customer_reviews.title: Just be prepared to have some matches handy. The ...
customer_reviews.text: Just be prepared to have some matches handy. The push button ignition feature did not work after the first lighting. Sadly, that was th reason I bought it - to have quick light in my shed at night.
customer_reviews.author: George Asimos Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I live in California and we are submitted to random power outages during windy times quite often. This lantern is safe and easy and I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: sheepherder

product_meta.title: Coleman Northstar Propane Lantern
product_meta.description: The next time you're enjoying the outdoors, take one of the brightest lanterns available—a Coleman NorthStar propane lantern. It lights easily without matches. Just push the InstaStart ignition. The lantern is designed for just the right light. Turn it up to its highest—1540 lumens—or dim it as low as you need it. Careful construction also allows you to take this lantern with you in any weather. Thanks to the Perfectflow system, your lantern receives consistent fuel, no matter the conditions or fuel level. Protecting the light, a high-temperature globe, metal guard and durable porcelain ventilator offer quality that will have you lighting this outdoor companion season after season. A folding base offers stability when the lantern is in use and low-profile storage when it's not. One 16.4-oz. propane cylinder will power the lantern for up to 4.3 hours on high and 9.25 hours on low. Insta-Clip tube mantles are our easiest to install.
feature_bullets: PerfectFlow system for consistent gas flow and light output
High-temperature globe resists cracking from heat
Adjustable dimmer knob for the perfect outdoor light

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
